title: Monopoly must lower price to sell more output

content.question: Which of the following is most likely to occur if the firm increases production beyond 10 units?

choices.label: Consumers would be willing to purchase more than 10 units at the price of $20 per unit.
The firm would definitely experience a loss.
The firm would have to lower its price to sell more than 10 units.
The firm's average cost of production would initially increase.

content.answer: The firm would have to lower its price to sell more than 10 units.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
